data.text: @thehorseman Understandable. Fingers crossed that by June things are more normal-ish.

@scottchantler @TorontoComics Still a bit leery about big, public gatherings, but certainly considering it. Perhaps with a hotel for once so as not to be rushed and able to enjoy a night in the big city.

Also official: I'll be back at @Calgaryexpo next month!

https://t.co/v0UFiQe3ur
@scottchantler @TorontoComics I am currently planning on attending.
@BarbarianLord You need to just come do the show sometime. Exactly the right kind of show for your work.
@scottchantler @TorontoComics so tempted to make the trip and get my Scott Chantler books signed!
@scottchantler @TorontoComics I wish! One day I hope to make it up there though.
